com.apusplay.sdk.pay

接口 Payable

  • 所有已知实现类:
    IabPay

    public interface Payable
    The basic payment interface.
    作者:
    Shyq

      Payment method
      void pay(Context context, String parameters, PayCallBack payCallBack)
      Payment method Just provides following parameters, other parameters would be in collect automatically // SdkConstants.TRANSACTION_ID transactionId // SdkConstants.PRIVATE_DATA // SdkConstants.PAY_ORIGIN // SdkConstants.NOTIFY_URL // SdkConstants.QUANTITY // SdkConstants.PRODUCT_ID

    • 方法详细资料

      • pay

        void pay(Context context,
       Bundle parameters,
       PayCallBack payCallBack)
         throws Exception
        Payment method
        参数:
        context - the application context that call this pay method
        parameters - parameter list in Bundle
        payCallBack - payment callback. Please refer to PayCallBack for detail
        抛出:
        Exception

      • pay

        void pay(Context context,
       String parameters,
       PayCallBack payCallBack)
         throws Exception
        Payment method Just provides following parameters, other parameters would be in collect automatically // SdkConstants.TRANSACTION_ID transactionId // SdkConstants.PRIVATE_DATA // SdkConstants.PAY_ORIGIN // SdkConstants.NOTIFY_URL // SdkConstants.QUANTITY // SdkConstants.PRODUCT_ID
        参数:
        context - the application context that call this pay method
        parameters - parameter list in json string
        payCallBack - payment callback. Please refer to PayCallBack for detail
        抛出:
        Exception

      • getOrderInfo

        void getOrderInfo(String orderId,
                PayCallBack getOrderCallBack)
        Retrieve order detailed info.
        参数:
        orderId - the order id to retrieve information.
        getOrderCallBack - the call back
